Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2010 02:46AM DeeDee2009 wrote: Hi everyone Im a newbie stage 1V. I came to the message board for support and positive news from other survivors. I just started Tykerb and xeloda and Im sooo scared. I did TCH and radiation then Herceptin which stopped working then FAC which stopped too and the docs seem so unsure. i just wanna live to see my kids grow up and nobody understands what im going through. Please help!
Posts.Title: WANTED: STAGE IV FIVE YEAR SURVIVORS! MCTHO eag1954
